ValidationRule.description: Validation required to ensure Confirmed Date are not left blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', Confirmed_Date__c = Published_Date__c, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go early') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Deferrals or Go Early, the Published Date can not equal the Effective Date.
